goals__remit:
Manufacturer of primary and  secondary aluminium materials and products 
adapting industrial production process to changing technical and economical framework of climate protection measures 
struggling for sustainable planning horizon of energy-political framework to allow longterm investments into necessary investments (demand response capabilities) to cope with changing energy supply characteristics (highly volatile generation profile, increasing spreads of power prices)
